description: Enterprise techniques used by iKitten, ATT&CK software S0278 v1.0
name: iKitten (S0278)

techniques.comment: iKitten will zip up the /Library/Keychains directory before exfiltrating it.[1]
iKitten saves itself with a leading "." so that it's hidden from users by default.[1]
iKitten prompts the user for their credentials.[1]
iKitten collects the keychains on the system.[1]
iKitten lists the current processes running.[1]
iKitten adds an entry to the rc.common file for persistence.[1]
iKitten will look for the current IP address.[1]
